BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HK_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_MST(NUM_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_ID, STR_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE HK_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_MST SET STR_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_ID=? and gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE HK_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_PERFORMANCE_PARAMETER_ID=? AND gnum_hospital_code=?
